. Balderk was an inhabitant of Baldurs Gate who died some years before the late 15 century DR.
Balderk died at sea, sometime before the , and was buried in the Lower City Graveyard, next to the Durinbold Mausoleum. The gravestone was etched with a single inscription "C Balderk. Taken by Umberlees rage. Recovered by Her grace." Balderks grave may had been accidentally desecrated, and the body risen as a zombie by Nina Dortmell, a talented child with the gift, who was trying to resurrect her recently deceased brother.
